message:
CHANCE
Advance to Illinois Ave. If you pass Go, collect $200

CHANCE
Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go, collect $200.

CHANCE
Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go, collect $200.

CHANCE
Advance to the nearest Railroad.
 If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
If owned, pay owner twice the retail to which they are otherwise entitled.
If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

CHANCE
Advance to the nearest Railroad.
 If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
If owned, pay owner twice the retail to which they are otherwise entitled.
If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

CHANCE
Bank pays you dividend of $50.

CHANCE
Get out of Jail Free.
This card may be kept until needed.

CHANCE
Go to Jail.
Go directly to Jail.
Do not pass GO, Do not collect $200.

CHANCE
Make general repairs on all your property:
 For each house pay $25, For each hotel pay $100.

CHANCE
Take a trip to Reading Railroad.
If you pass Go, collect $200.

CHANCE
Take a walk on the Boardwalk.
Advance token to Boardwalk.

CHANCE
You have been elected Chairman of the Board.
 Pay each player $50.

CHANCE
Your building and loan matures.
 Receive $150.

CHANCE
You have won a crossword competition.
Collect $100
